title: Universe

embed.description: Welcome to Universe, the definitive source for the world of League of Legends.Here you'll find a vast collection of art and artifacts, like bios chronicling the origins of your favorite champions and landscapes depicting the historic regions they hail from.

body:
We all play the game for many reasons

Some are here just to win!
Some are here for the gameplay.
Some are here because they appreciate the characters.

But whatever your reasons for being here, i desperately urge you to check out the Universe! 
I think its just fantastic, in my opinion it enhances the experience of league, it puts all the characters in context and so you understand the in-game interactions so much more.

and aside from all that, its just fun and informative, a good way of using up some time between games ^^

Many have already checked it out I'm sure, but for those who haven't, please do have a look. :)

replies.body:
Universe is amazing. It's what I have always wanted and a step in the right direction to building the world of Runeterra =D

An added benefit now is when I go and search for all the content we create outside of patches to show people its centralised and in one place.

Yes thats true! its so great.
i love the map in particular, it really brings Runeterra to life! 

I really look forward to seeing Universe grow!
